entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:32 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:32 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
